changeSet.author: WeiChen
changeSet.sql: create table ledger_receipt ( id bigint, signed boolean, type varchar(20), range_type varchar(20), range_begin timestamp, range_end timestamp, stamp_tax boolean, time timestamp, constraint ledger_ledger_receipt_pkey primary key (id) ); create index on ledger_receipt (id);

create table ledger_ledger_receipt ( lid bigint not null constraint fk_ledger_ledger_receipt_ledger_id references ledger, lrid bigint not null constraint fk_ledger_ledger_receipt_ledger_receipt_id references ledger_receipt, constraint ledger_ledger_receipt_pkey primary key (lid, lrid) ); create index on ledger_receipt (lid, lrid);
